media.headline: Nats turn double play
media.blurb: BOS@WSH: Scherzer and Wieters combine for double play
media.bigblurb: Max Scherzer strikes out Mookie Betts and Matt Wieters throws out Andrew Benintendi for the inning-ending double play in the 1st inning

media.headline: Eaton pops sacrifice fly
media.blurb: BOS@WSH: Harper scores on Eaton's sacrifice fly
media.bigblurb: Adam Eaton pops a sacrifice fly to deep right to bring home Bryce Harper and give the Nationals a 2-0 lead in the bottom of the 1st inning

media.headline: Bradley Jr.'s RBI groundout
media.blurb: BOS@WSH: Bradley Jr. smacks RBI groundout to second
media.bigblurb: Jackie Bradley Jr. smacks an RBI groundout to 2nd to score Hanley Ramirez and bring the score to 2-1 Nationals in the top of the 2nd inning

media.headline: Vazquez's RBI single
media.blurb: BOS@WSH: Vazquez lines RBI single to left
media.bigblurb: Christian Vazquez lines an RBI single to left field to score Pablo Sandoval and tie the game at 2

media.headline: Military gives Nats players tour
media.blurb: BOS@WSH: Nats players given tour by military
media.bigblurb: The U.S. Naval Academy provides the Nationals with a tour, showing all the different kinds of machines and equipment in the facility

media.headline: Harper's RBI double
media.blurb: BOS@WSH: Harper knocks RBI double to deep right
media.bigblurb: Bryce Harper hits an RBI double over Mookie Betts' head to score Trea Turner and give the Nationals a 3-2 lead in the 5th

media.headline: Miller scores on error
media.blurb: BOS@WSH: Miller scores on missed-catch error
media.bigblurb: Chris Young grounds a ball to Brandon Snyder who throws to Bryan Mejia who misses the catch that allows Mike Miller to take home in the 9th

media.headline: Rodriguez strikes out Wieters
media.bigblurb: Eduardo Rodriguez strikes out Matt Wieters swinging to get out of a jam in the bottom of the 1st inning

media.headline: Lin scores on fielder's choice
media.blurb: BOS@WSH: Lin scores on fielder's choice, error
media.bigblurb: Sandy Leon advances to second on a throwing error by Bryan Mejia, while Tzu-Wei Lin scores to bring the Red Sox within a run

media.headline: Turner scores on Werth's walk
media.blurb: BOS@WSH: Rodriguez walks Werth, Turner scores
media.bigblurb: Eduardo Rodriguez walks Jayson Werth with the bases loaded to bring home Trea Turner and give the Nationals a 1-0 lead in the 1st inning

media.headline: Difo's RBI groundout
media.blurb: BOS@WSH: Difo rips RBI groundout to shortstop
media.bigblurb: Wilmer Difo rips an RBI groundout to Deiner Lopez who throws to first for the out while Jose Lobaton scores in the bottom of the 6th inning

media.headline: Harper drives in golf cart
media.blurb: BOS@WSH: Harper shows off his MVP skills in golf cart
media.bigblurb: Bryce Harper takes his MVP skills to the street as he drives a golf cart across the naval academy campus in the top of the 6th inning

media.headline: Navy mascot wins President race
media.blurb: BOS@WSH: Navy mascot steals show in President's race
media.bigblurb: The Navy mascot steals the show in the classic President's race as he wins easily at the U.S. Naval Academy
